From: JoAnnefmorrison@aol.com [mailto:JoAnnefmorrison@aol.com] Sent: Tuesday, January 03, 2012 3:12 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: from the desk of Mary Furlong
Hi Steve, Mary would like to schedule a follow up call with you. Please send some available times that would work for you. thanks, Jo Anne
Jo Anne Morrison Mary Furlong & Associates 559-905-4425 (f) 559-438-6697 www.boomersummit.com
